body:
# Depwatcher

A concourse resource to watch for new releases of dependencies.

The Buildpacks team use this to build new dependencies for buildpacks.

The various depwatchers in this resource (in `src`) are written in Crystal, as are the tests (in `spec`).

## Run unit tests

`crystal spec --no-debug`

### Notes
* You may need to install dependencies via `crystal deps` before running tests.
* You may need to set `export PKG_CONFIG_PATH="/usr/local/opt/openssl/lib/pkgconfig"` if crystal fails link against `libssl`.


## Building/Pushing

`docker build -t cfbuildpacks/depwatcher .`

`docker push cfbuildpacks/depwatcher`

## Example run

```
$ echo '{"source":{"type":"github_releases","name":"hwc","repo":"cloudfoundry/hwc","extension":"exe"}}' | crystal src/check.cr
  {"source":{"type":"github_releases","name":"hwc","repo":"cloudfoundry/hwc","extension":"exe"}}
  [{"ref":"1.0.0"},{"ref":"1.0.1"},{"ref":"2.0.0"}]

$ echo '{"source":{"type":"github_releases","name":"hwc","repo":"cloudfoundry/hwc","extension":"exe"},"version":{"ref":"2.0.0"}}' | crystal src/in.cr -- /tmp
{"source":{"type":"github_releases","name":"hwc","repo":"cloudfoundry/hwc","extension":"exe"},"version":{"ref":"2.0.0"}}
{"ref":"2.0.0","url":"https://github.com/cloudfoundry/hwc/releases/download/2.0.0/hwc.exe","sha256":"1bad9c61262702404653f4d043d79082e8a181ee33e2c1e11db3eb346e7fcd33"}
{"version":{"ref":"2.0.0"}}
```

def.name: in
def.body:
r = releases.find do |r|
  r.ref == ref
end
if r
else
  raise("Could not find data for version")
end
r

def.name: to_json
def.body:
json.object do
  _ref = @ref
  if _ref.nil?
  else
    json.field("ref") do
      _ref.to_json(json)
    end
  end
  _url = @url
  if _url.nil?
  else
    json.field("url") do
      _url.to_json(json)
    end
  end
  _sha256 = @sha256
  if _sha256.nil?
  else
    json.field("sha256") do
      _sha256.to_json(json)
    end
  end
end

def.name: get_sha256
def.body:
data = (client.get(url)).body
hash = OpenSSL::Digest.new("SHA256")
hash.update(data)
return hash.hexdigest

def.name: check
def.body:
response = (client.get("https://packages.broadcom.com/artifactory/apm-agents/")).body
doc = XML.parse_html(response)
links = doc.xpath("//a[@href]")
if links.is_a?(XML::NodeSet)
else
  raise("Could not parse apache httpd website")
end
links.map do |link|
  href = link["href"].to_s
  m = href.match(/^CA-APM-PHPAgent-([\d\.]+)_linux.tar.gz/)
  if m
    version = m[1]
  end
  if version
    Internal.new(version)
  end
end.compact.sort_by do |i|
  SemanticVersion.new(i.ref)
end.last(10)

def.name: check
def.body:
response = (client.get("https://cran.cnr.berkeley.edu/web/packages/#{name}/index.html")).body
doc = XML.parse_html(response)
version = doc.xpath("//td/text()[normalize-space(.) = \"Version:\"]//parent::td/following-sibling::td/text()[normalize-space(.)]")
if version.is_a?(XML::NodeSet)
else
  raise("Could not parse #{name} website")
end
version = version.to_s.gsub("-", ".")
return [Internal.new(version)]

def.name: in
def.body:
semver = ref.split(".")
major = semver[0]
minor = semver[1]
patch = ""
if semver.size > 2
  patch = "#{(  name == "Rserve") ? "-" : "."}#{semver[2]}"
end
Release.new(ref, "https://cran.cnr.berkeley.edu/src/contrib/#{name}_#{major}.#{minor}#{patch}.tar.gz")

def.name: in
def.body:
tag = (dotnet_tags(tag_regex)).select do |t|
  t.name == ref
end.first?
if tag.nil?
  return tag
end
url = "https://github.com/dotnet/cli/archive/#{tag.commit}.tar.gz"
DotnetRelease.new(tag.name, "https://github.com/dotnet/cli", tag.commit, get_sha256(url))

def.body:
_ = allocate

if _.responds_to?(:finalize)
  ::GC.add_finalizer(_)
end
_

def.name: check
def.body:
(releases(repo)).reject do |r|
  (r.prerelease && (!allow_prerelease)) || r.draft
end.map do |r|
  if r.ref != ""
    Internal.new(r.ref)
  end
end.compact.sort_by do |i|
  SemanticVersion.new(i.ref)
end

def.name: find_github_release
def.body:
github_release = (releases(repo)).find do |r|
  r.ref == ref
end
if github_release
else
  raise("Could not find release data for version")
end
github_release

instance_methods.name: in
instance_methods.args_string: (repo : String, ext : String, ref : String, dir : String) : Release

def.name: in
def.body:
github_release = find_github_release(repo, ref)
asset = github_release.assets.select do |a|
  a.name.ends_with?(ext)
end
if asset.size == 1
else
  raise("Could not determine a single url for version")
end
sha = download_release(asset.first.browser_download_url, dir)
Release.new(github_release.ref, asset.first.browser_download_url, sha)

instance_methods.args_string: (repo : String, ref : String, dir : String) : Release

def.name: in
def.body:
github_release = find_github_release(repo, ref)
download_url = "https://github.com/#{repo}/archive/#{github_release.tag_name}.tar.gz"
sha = download_release(download_url, dir)
Release.new(github_release.ref, download_url, sha)

def.name: get
def.body:
response = HTTP::Client.get(url, headers)
if (response.status_code == 301) || (response.status_code == 302)
  get(response.headers["location"], headers)
else
  if response.status_code == 200
    response
  else
    raise("Could not download data from #{url}: code #{response.status_code}")
  end
end

def.name: get
def.body:
context = OpenSSL::SSL::Context::Client.insecure
response = HTTP::Client.get(url, headers: headers, tls: context)
if (response.status_code == 301) || (response.status_code == 302)
  get(response.headers["location"], headers)
else
  if response.status_code == 200
    response
  else
    raise("Could not download data from #{url}: code #{response.status_code}")
  end
end

def.name: check
def.body:
response = (client.get("http://archive.apache.org/dist/httpd/")).body
doc = XML.parse_html(response)
links = doc.xpath("//a[starts-with(@href, 'CURRENT')]")
if links.is_a?(XML::NodeSet)
else
  raise("Could not parse apache httpd website")
end
links.map do |link|
  href = link["href"].to_s
  m = href.match(/^CURRENT-IS-([\d\.]+)/)
  if m
    version = m[1]
  end
  if version
    Internal.new(version)
  end
end.compact.sort_by do |i|
  SemanticVersion.new(i.ref)
end.last(10)

def.name: check
def.body:
(releases(generation) do |m, _|
  Internal.new(m[1])
end).sort_by do |i|
  SemanticVersion.new(i.ref)
end

def.name: in
def.body:
url = "https://repo.continuum.io/miniconda/Miniconda#{generation}-#{ref}-Linux-x86_64.sh"
(releases(generation) do |m, e|
  if m[1] == ref
    Release.new(ref, url, e.children[7].text, get_sha256(url))
  end
end).first

def.name: check
def.body:
name = "nginx/nginx"
regexp = "^release-\\d+.\\d+.\\d+$"
((GithubTags.new(client)).matched_tags(name, regexp)).map do |r|
  Internal.new(r.name.gsub(/^release\-/, ""))
end.sort_by do |i|
  SemanticVersion.new(i.ref)
end

def.name: check
def.body:
response = (client.get("https://secure.php.net/downloads.php")).body
doc = XML.parse_html(response)
links = doc.xpath_nodes("//h3[starts-with(@id,'v')]/@id")
links.map do |e|
  e.content
end.map do |v|
  Internal.new(v[1..-1])
end.sort_by do |i|
  SemanticVersion.new(i.ref)
end

def.name: in
def.body:
url = "https://php.net/distributions/php-#{ref}.tar.gz"
response = (client.get("https://secure.php.net/downloads.php")).body
doc = XML.parse_html(response)
links = doc.xpath_nodes("//h3[@id=\"v#{ref}\"]/following-sibling::div/ul/li[a[contains(@href,\".tar.gz\")]]/span[@class='sha256']")
if links.empty?
  links = links_for_old_versions(ref)
end
Release.new(ref, url, links.first.text.to_s.lchop("sha256: "))

def.name: in
def.body:
release = (releases(name))[ref].select do |r|
  r.packagetype == "sdist"
end.sort_by do |r|
  r.size
end.first
release.ref = ref
Release.new(ref, release.url, release.md5_digest, release.digests["sha256"])

def.name: check
def.body:
response = (client.get("https://www.python.org/downloads/")).body
doc = XML.parse_html(response)
lis = doc.xpath("//*[contains(@class,'release-number')]/a")
if lis.is_a?(XML::NodeSet)
else
  raise("Could not parse python website")
end
(lis.map do |a|
  v = a.text.gsub(/^\s*Python\s*/, "")
  Internal.new(v)
end.first(10)).reverse

def.name: in
def.body:
response = (client.get("https://www.python.org/downloads/release/python-#{ref.gsub(/\D/, "")}/")).body
doc = XML.parse_html(response)
a = doc.xpath("//a[contains(text(),'Gzipped source tarball')]")
if a.is_a?(XML::NodeSet)
else
  raise("Could not parse python release (a) website")
end
a = a.first
tr = a.xpath("./ancestor::tr")
if tr.is_a?(XML::NodeSet)
else
  raise("Could not parse python release (tr) website")
end
tr = tr.first
md5_digest = tr.xpath("./td[position()=4]")
if md5_digest.is_a?(XML::NodeSet)
else
  raise("Could not parse python release (md5_digest) website")
end
Release.new(ref, a["href"], md5_digest.first.text, get_sha256(a["href"]))

def.name: check
def.body:
response = (client.get("https://svn.r-project.org/R/tags/")).body
doc = XML.parse_html(response)
lis = doc.xpath("//li/a")
if lis.is_a?(XML::NodeSet)
else
  raise("Could not parse r svn website")
end
lis.map do |a|
  href = a["href"].to_s
  m = href.match(/^R\-([\d\-]+)\//)
  if m
    version = m[1].gsub("-", ".")
  end
  if version
    Internal.new(version)
  end
end.compact.sort_by do |i|
  SemanticVersion.new(i.ref)
end.last(10)

def.name: check
def.body:
response = (client.get("https://rubygems.org/pages/download")).body
doc = XML.parse_html(response)
links = doc.xpath("//a[contains(@class,'download__format')][text()='tgz']")
if links.is_a?(XML::NodeSet)
else
  raise("Could not parse rubygems download website")
end
links.map do |a|
  v = a["href"].gsub(/.*\/rubygems\-(.*)\.tgz$/, "\\1")
  Internal.new(v)
end

r = major <=> other.major
if r != 0
  return r
end
r = minor <=> other.minor
if r != 0
  return r
end
r = patch <=> other.patch
if r != 0
  return r
end
r = metadata <=> other.metadata
if r != 0
  return r
end
original <=> other.original

types.name: SemanticVersionFilter
types.summary: NOTE Keep in sync with 'tasks/build-binary-new/create-new-version-line-story.rb'!

def.name: match
def.body:
semver_string : String = "#{semver.major}.#{semver.minor}.#{semver.patch}"
first_x_idx = @filter_string.index("X")
if first_x_idx.nil?
  semver_string == @filter_string
else
  prefix = @filter_string[0, first_x_idx]
  (semver_string.starts_with?(prefix)) && @filter_string.size <= semver_string.size
end
